p: Official methods of the Association of Official Analytical Chemists were used for the determination of seed flour amino acid (method 982.30) and seed oil fatty acid (methods 996.06, Ce 2-66, 965.49, and 969.33) profiles [11]. Essential amino acid score was calculated with reference to the FAO/WHO/UNU reference amino acid pattern [12] as follows:(1)Amino acid score=Test amino acidReference amino acid×100.
